snippet: FRANK--Arnold, of West Palm Beach and Jericho, NY died peacefully on March 3, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandy, father of Larry, Linda and Bruce, grandfather of seven, uncle of eight and friend to all. Storyteller bar none. He will be sorely missed! 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRANK--Arnold, of West Palm Beach and Jericho, NY died peacefully on March 3, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandy, father of Larry, Linda and Bruce, grandfather of seven, uncle of eight and friend to all. Storyteller bar none. He will be sorely missed! 1/3
